title: Will the Rams bounce back & is Baker Mayfield suffering from the curse of "sposta?"
itunes:title: Will the Rams bounce back & is Baker Mayfield suffering from the curse of "sposta?"
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined in Studio 66 by Cole Wright to recap the Week 6 games! The guys quickly get into the Chiefs loss and why Shek thinks they should trade away Tyreek Hill for defensive help (4:40). Next up, Dave brings up the Los Angeles Rams and how he still believes they won't reach the playoffs after their loss at home to the San Francisco 49ers (9:25). Then, Shek talks about the curse of sposta's new victim - Baker Mayfield and why he compares to Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw (18:30). They round out the show debating which of the Rams, Cowboys, Chargers and Chiefs do you trust the most (29:40)?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
